page.title: 10My Own End of Term Report
page.content: Name: Girl Age:11 Handwriting:Pretty good with italic pen, awful with pencil. Reading: Can read just about any book, a real bookworm, prefers humour. English:Pretty good but gets mixed up with apostrophes. stories humourous & complicated.Spelling good but careless. Maths:Doing well,has difficulty with times tables.Had good experience teaching adults "Arrow Programme". Project: Tackling "Supernatural beings" quite scientifically. Making own "Ghost Grabbers" puppet play. Athletics:Hates sport, bad loser. Art:Good drawing, useless painter. Behaviour:Reasonable,sometimes cheeky. Music:Very musical,my grades so far:- Cello:Grade 1, Piano:grade 1. I also play recorder and lute and sing in the church choir.
